definitions.title: adj. gent. Ammonite
definitions.body: ;—abs. ms. [[עַמּוֹנִי]] as subst. De 23:4 an Ammonite (generic), so [[עַמּׂנִי]] Ne 13:1; [[הָעַמּוֹנִי]] of individual 1Sa 11:1, 1Sa 11:2, 2Sa 23:37 = 1Ch 11:39, Ne 2:19, so [[הָיַמּׂנִי]] Ne 2:10, Ne 4:3; fs. [[הָעַמּׂנִית]] 1Ki 14:21 = 2Ch 12:13, 1Ki 14:31, so [[הָעַמּוֹנִית]] 2Ch 24:26; [[הָעַמּׂנִי]] as subst. coll. Ezr 9:1; mpl. as subst. [[עַמּׂנִים]] 1Ki 11:5, ´[[הָע]] De 2:20, Ne 4:1, ´[[הָעַמּוֹ]] 2Ch 26:8 (on 2Ch 20:1 v. [[מְעוּנִים]]); fpl. as adj. [[עַמֳּנִיּׁת]] 1Ki 11:1, so Ne 13:23 Qr, Kt [[עמוניות]].
